text: The 2025 NFL season will be the 106th season of the National Football League (NFL). The season will begin on September 4, 2025, with Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles hosting the NFL Kickoff Game. And the regular season will end on January 4, 2026. The playoffs will begin on January 10, 2025, and will end with Super Bowl LX on February 8, 2025 at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California, near San Francisco. Category:2025 in sports Category:National Football League seasons
title: 2025 NFL season
